alert.note: Alert for Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 3:56PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mariposa, southwestern Tuolumne and northeastern Merced Counties through 430 PM PDT... At 355 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of La Grange to 12 miles west of Yosemite National. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crane Flat Campground, White Wolf Campground, Gin Flat, Crane Flat and Hodgdon Meadow Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
